narrative.narrative: NICA, or Nicaraguense de Aviacion, was around from 1994 to 2004 and was a subsidiary of El Salvador airline TACA. It was a spiritual succesor to Aeronica which TACA had a 49% stake in in its final year in 1992. NICA served San Jose,Costa Rica San Salvador,El Salvador Guatemala City,Guatemala San Pedro Sula,Hoduras and Panama City,Panama. Aeronica had served much the same but served Mexico City and Miami,USA and not Honduras. NICA used at least one Boeing 737-200 Adv. from the start to end in October 2004. It was merged into TACA at the end.
